entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `RuntimeHelpers.IsMethodFullyOptimized` for benchmarking tools #99870
  • Occasional ObjectDisposedException on ConcurrencyLimiter AttemptAcquire #99865
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel Foreach #99864
  • .net core 8 UDP Socket gets stuck on the first endpoint it sends to #99863
  • Error "Hosting components are already initialized. Re-initialization to execute an app is not allowed." #99858
  • FreeBSD 13 jail: Failed to create CoreCLR: HRESULT: 0x8007054f #99857
  • XML signature still fails to verify #99856
  • Net8 Program runs slowly for some reason when updated to Visual Studio 17.9.2/3 #99851

Closed

  • Signature validation error - Microsoft Services Store Api #99821
  • [wasm] Chrome version bumper improvements #97364
    9.0.0
  • Evaluate JIT_MemCpy with wider copies using AVX2 on hardware that support it #6702
    Future
  • Redundant bound check "(uint)c > 'f' ? 0xFF : CharToHexLookup[c]" #81160
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CoreCLR stress pipelines that run libraries tests only #99868
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] RFC: Port most of x86 ResumeSP logic from CoreCLR #99866
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Constructor comment fix (this is class SHA3_512) #99860
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • some code clean up in heap_select #99855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible. #99854
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Convert GetCurrentMethod to QCALL #99852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix SuperPMI collections #99867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Codespaces need more disc to succeed building on container creation #99803
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Fix "we can't find snapshot urls" #99814
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable publishing in VMR #99432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix hijack. #99853
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Use safer/simpler span construction in a few places #99834
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #99656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.5

Updated

  • `GetMaxCharCount` tweak #99872
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMarshal.Cast in a few places #99835
    area-Meta
  • JIT: fix synthetic profile check option, track improper headers #99795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough quirk in fgFindInsertPoint #99783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough check in optFindLoopCompactionInsertionPoint #99827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable time tracking in wasm release builds because it's expensive #99841
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILCompiler: Fix values of IsSupported for HW intrinsics on 32-bit platforms #99753
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Harden SecKeyCopyExternalRepresentation against sensitive keys #99840
    area-System.Security
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix failing BerConverterTests.Decode_TestData test #99793
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/6.0-staging` #99837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum values are not checked by IDE1006 (naming rules) #72574
  • Inconsistent dispose behavior between `await using` and `await foreach` #72573
    17.10
  • IntelliSense loses the type of Action<T> parameter only while typing #72571

PullRequests

Created

  • Add suppressor Ids to ReportAnalyzer output #72572
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.2.0.7535 #71837
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor StreamRendering bug with EF Core #54569

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54534
  • Perf improvement: updates #54563
  • The target "GenerateNPMCommandProps" does not exists in the project #54568
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #54549

PullRequests

Updated

  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54448
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView is not currently being Garbage Collected (2) #21249
  • Unable to enable Hyper-V #21248
  • This problem is easy to occur when debugging the real machine in VS17.9.3+Maui8.0.10, which is stuck all the time, and the phone does not have an application installed. VS17.9.3+Maui8.0.7 is normal. #21247
  • Android - Spashscreen image not scaled correctly #21245
  • Handling macOS app termination process on MAUI multiwindow app #21243

Closed

  • Button ImageSource not Scaling as expected. #18242
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Problem: Unable to enable Hyper-V in my laptop with x64 #20373
  • MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate: PlatformView cannot be null here #17569
  • Border does not redraw reliably when new HeightRequest/WidthRequest is made in Android - any way to force redraw? #21244

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Cache full app package file path #21246
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • [android] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #21218
    platform/android 🤖, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Rework foreground color and remove outdated methods #21238
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
